net.bytebuddy.implementation.bind

接口 MethodDelegationBinder.Record

  • 所有已知实现类:
    MethodDelegationBinder.Processor, MethodDelegationBinder.Record.Illegal, TargetMethodAnnotationDrivenBinder.Record
    封闭接口:
    MethodDelegationBinder

    public static interface MethodDelegationBinder.Record
    A method delegation that was compiled to a target method.

    • 嵌套类概要

      嵌套类 
      限定符和类型 接口和说明
      static class  MethodDelegationBinder.Record.Illegal
      A compiled method delegation binder that only yields illegal bindings.

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      MethodDelegationBinder.MethodBinding bind(Implementation.Target implementationTarget, MethodDescription source, MethodDelegationBinder.TerminationHandler terminationHandler, MethodDelegationBinder.MethodInvoker methodInvoker, Assigner assigner)
      Attempts a binding of a source method to this compiled target.

    • 方法详细资料

      • bind

        MethodDelegationBinder.MethodBinding bind(Implementation.Target implementationTarget,
                                          MethodDescription source,
                                          MethodDelegationBinder.TerminationHandler terminationHandler,
                                          MethodDelegationBinder.MethodInvoker methodInvoker,
                                          Assigner assigner)
        Attempts a binding of a source method to this compiled target.
        参数:
        implementationTarget - The target of the current implementation onto which this binding is to be applied.
        source - The method that is to be bound to the target method.
        terminationHandler - Ther termination handler to apply.
        methodInvoker - The method invoker to use.
        assigner - The assigner to use.
        返回:
        A binding representing this attempt to bind the source method to the target method.
